Member Enumeration Documentation

enum DrmInfo::Operation
 

Operation is an enumeration representing all possible rights of an object protected by DRM. We internally store this information in x^2 steps of integer values to keep the storage most simple (we only need one integer). Access to this information is provided by methods ranging from "IsPlayable()" to "IsForwardable()".

Enumerator:
c_none 
c_play 
c_display 
c_execute 
c_print 
c_forward 
c_no_lock 
c_forward_lock 
c_combined_delivery 
c_separate_delivery

Member Function Documentation

void DrmInfo::Init (  UINT16  drm_method  ) 
 

Init

Parameters:
drm_method defines the method type of the delivered object. if the method is forward lock (c_forward_lock) we do not check the parameter operations. is shall be 0
operations defines the operations which are allowed for this object a combination can be achieved by adding up right, e.g. (c_display + c_print)

IsCombinedDelivered

Returns:
if object is combined delivered

BOOLEAN DrmInfo::IsDisplayable (   ) 
 

IsDisplayable returns, if the object is allowed to be displayed. The right to be displayed it one of the basic rights of DRM.

Returns:
if object is allowed to be displayed

BOOLEAN DrmInfo::IsExecutable (   ) 
 

IsExecutable returns, if the object is allowed to be executed. The right to be executed it one of the basic rights of DRM.

Returns:
if object is allowed to be executed

BOOLEAN DrmInfo::IsForwardable (   ) 
 

IsForwardable returns, if the object is allowed to be forwarded to other devices. The right to be printed it one of the basic rights of DRM.

Returns:
if object is allowed to be printed

if object is forward locked

BOOLEAN DrmInfo::IsPlayable (   )

void DrmInfo::ReadFrom (  const DrmInfoPersistStructure &  persist_structure  ) 
 

ReadFrom initializes a DrmInfo object with the values stored in a DrmInfo::Persist structure.

Parameters:
profile A reference to a Persist structure containing drm-information

void DrmInfo::WriteTo (  DrmInfoPersistStructure *  persist_structure  )  const
 

WriteTo returns a persist structure with a fixed size, which can be easily persisted in memory or a file system.

Parameters:
profile A pointer to a Persist structure
